Query.Sentence: with tabla as( select p.*, t.t_name, tm.*, (tm.tm_end_time - tm.tm_start_time) as tm_duration from tasks t inner join timers tm on t.t_id = tm.t_id inner join projects p on p.p_id = t.p_id where not tm.tm_end_time is null) select p_id, p_name, p_description, p_date, sum(tm_duration) as project_total_time from tabla group by p_id, p_name, p_description, p_date #WHERE#
